articles.description: Mukesh Ambani's Reliance's deal for Naturals would come just weeks after it launched its first in-house premium fashion and lifestyle store: Report
articles.content: Reliance Retail, a unit of Indian oil-to-chemicals conglomerate Reliance Industries , plans to enter the salon business and is in final stages to buy a roughly 49% stake in Naturals Salon & Spa, … [+1371 chars]
